text: Dust dorand hamcunon, ki xud ʙa rohi kufr meravand, sumo niz kofir saved, to ʙaroʙar garded. Pas ʙo hec jak az onon dusti makuned, to on goh ki dar rohi Xudo muhocirat kunand. Va agar ruj gardonand, dar har co ki onhoro ʙijoʙed, ʙigiredu ʙikused va hec jak az onhoro ʙa dustivu jori intixoʙ nakuned
